text: [Music]
greetings my name is Matt wood and I'm
here at the AWS headquarters in Seattle
to announce the availability of decks
the DynamoDB accelerator decks is a
fully managed highly available in memory
accelerator for DynamoDB that delivers
up to text performance improvement from
milliseconds to microseconds even of
millions of requests per second
DAC says all the heavy lifting required
to add in memory acceleration to your
DynamoDB tables without requiring
developers to manage cache invalidation
data population or cluster management
now you can focus on building great
applications for your customers without
worrying about performance at any scale
further developers love the fact that
they do not need to change application
logic since Dax is compatible with
existing DynamoDB API calls
you can enable Dax with just a few
clicks in the AWS management console or
using the AWS SDK
just as with DynamoDB you only pay for
the capacity you provision visit the Dax
page to learn more about getting started
with Dax thanks a lot
[Music]
